name: Harmonica Key Finder
body:
Harmonica Key Finder app, written in JavaScript. At the moment, it only targets Android using PhoneGap.

Published to Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.johnnycardy.keyfinder

Contact jcardy@gmail.com.
tagline: Mobile app for the diatonic harmonica player
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
